name: The Invasion (I Want To Write For Blizzard)
name_original: The Invasion (I Want To Write For Blizzard)
description:
LENGTH: ~5-10 Minutes

GENRE: Sci-Fi

SUMMARY: 

You’re handcuffed in a basement being held by a child who warns you if you try to leave or go outside you will die. You need to figure out a way to get out alive before it’s too late.

View more stories & games at IWantToWriteForBlizzard.com

THINGS TO KNOW: 

This story is an interactive “choose your own adventure” story driven style games.

The way it works – select “play game” and during the gameplay you will be presented with options to advance the story.
developers: I Want To Write For Blizzard
